verses.verse: <S%G3767>Then<s%> cometh <S%G2064>he<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G4540>Samaria<s%>, which is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G4965>Sychar<s%>, <S%G4139>near<s%> to the parcel of <S%G5564>ground<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob's<s%> <S%G4077>well<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%>. <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, being <S%G2872>wearied<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> his <S%G3597>journey<s%>, <S%G2516>sat<s%> <S%G3779>thus<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G4077>well<s%>: and it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G5616>about<s%> the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> of <S%G4542>Samaria<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, How is it <S%G4459>that<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%>, <S%G5607>being<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew<s%>, <S%G154>askest<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>, which <S%G5607>am<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> of <S%G4542>Samaria<s%>? <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4798>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4798>dealings<s%> with the <S%G4541>Samaritans<s%>.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>her<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> thou <S%G1492>knewest<s%> the <S%G1431>gift<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> that <S%G3004>saith<s%> to <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G1325>Give<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%>; <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G302>wouldest<s%> have <S%G154>asked<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G302>would<s%> have <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%>.

The <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2962>Sir<s%>, thou <S%G2192>hast<s%> <S%G3777>nothing<s%> to draw <S%G502>with<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5421>well<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G901>deep<s%>: from <S%G4159>whence<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> hast <S%G2192>thou<s%> that <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%>?

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3739>whosoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G4095>drinketh<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> shall <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1372>shall<s%> <S%G1519>never<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G3364><s%> <S%G1372>thirst<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I shall <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> shall <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G4077>well<s%> of <S%G5204>water<s%> springing <S%G242>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G166>everlasting<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G4353>worshippers<s%> shall <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in <S%G225>truth<s%>: <S%G2532>for<s%> <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2212>seeketh<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> to <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2316>God<s%> is a <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they that <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> him <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in <S%G225>truth<s%>.

The <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3323>Messias<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>: <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G1565>he<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%>, he will <S%G312>tell<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>.

The <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5201>waterpot<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> went her <S%G565>way<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> to the <S%G444>men<s%>,

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> one to <S%G4314>another<s%> <S%G240><s%>, <S%G5342>Hath<s%> any <S%G3387>man<s%> <S%G5342>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> ought to <S%G5315>eat<s%>?

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G1699>My<s%> <S%G1033>meat<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of him that <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G5048>finish<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%>.

<S%G3004>Say<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%>, <S%G3754>There<s%> <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> four <S%G5072>months<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> then <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G2326>harvest<s%>? <S%G2400>behold<s%>, I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, Lift <S%G1869>up<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> look <S%G2300>on<s%> the <S%G5561>fields<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2326>harvest<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he that <S%G2325>reapeth<s%> <S%G2983>receiveth<s%> <S%G3408>wages<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4863>gathereth<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%>: <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> he that <S%G4687>soweth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he that <S%G2325>reapeth<s%> may <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G3674>together<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G4541>Samaritans<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G3056>saying<s%> of the <S%G1135>woman<s%>, which <S%G3140>testified<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> He <S%G2036>told<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G3745>ever<s%> I <S%G4160>did<s%>.

<S%G3767>So<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> the <S%G4541>Samaritans<s%> were <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, they <S%G2065>besought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> that he would <S%G3306>tarry<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G3306>abode<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>.

<S%G5037>And<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto the <S%G1135>woman<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> <S%G3765>Now<s%> we <S%G4100>believe<s%>, <S%G3754>not<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G4674>thy<s%> <S%G2981>saying<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> we have <S%G191>heard<s%> him <S%G846>ourselves<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G230>indeed<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, the <S%G4990>Saviour<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he was <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, the <S%G1057>Galilaeans<s%> <S%G1209>received<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, having <S%G3708>seen<s%> all the <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G1859>feast<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2064>went<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G1859>feast<s%>.

<S%G3767>So<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G2580>Cana<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, <S%G3699>where<s%> he <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G937>nobleman<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> was <S%G770>sick<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum<s%>. nobleman: or, courtier, or, ruler

When <S%G3778>he<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G2240>come<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>, he <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2065>besought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he would come <S%G2597>down<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2390>heal<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> he was at the <S%G3195>point<s%> of <S%G599>death<s%>.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Go thy <S%G4198>way<s%>; <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G2198>liveth<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G2036>spoken<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> he went his <S%G4198>way<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> enquired <S%G4441>he<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G2192>began<s%> to <S%G2866>amend<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> <S%G5504>Yesterday<s%> at the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> the <S%G4446>fever<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G3767>So<s%> the <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it was <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> <S%G4675>Thy<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G2198>liveth<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%>.

<S%G5124>This<s%> is <S%G3825>again<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G4592>miracle<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%>, when he was come <S%G2064>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%>.
